page.title: 06How I Spend My Saturday
page.content: by Aisha Ejaz. On Saturday my sisters and I wake up and go to the bathroom and wash our faces and hands and while we are doing that we say a prayer.It is a special kind of prayer.The prayer is Bissmilla irahma neraheem.After that we brush our teeth.Then we have a bath and the bath is a bubble bath so that we can get clean.Then we get dry and go to {mosque}and then we read loud.This makes God very proud of us then we read another{Koran}and then we can play with some toys if we have been good.After we have played we get our shoes on and go home.Then we read on a special mat and after that we read a book.Then we have another bath.After our bath we get dry and drink some milk.Then our mother brushes our hair. Then we say a prayer and then we go to bed.
